to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: samba and deb problems.
body:
hello list,
I just did:
chown -R thecreator:thecreator /ftp/pub and set perms as follows
chmod -R ug+rwx /ftp/pub
chmod -R o-rwx /ftp/pub.
ls -l confirms this.
When I do su I get: /ftp/pub/.bashrc: permission denied.
Also, samba won't go in to that folder, windows just freezes.
Any ideas? Help would be appriciated.
Thanks,
_______________________________________________

Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
